sense.def:
To sever something
pomeni nekaj z ostrim predmetom razdeliti na dva dela oziroma zarezati skozi tisto.

seg.quote: A bulldozer had severed a gas pipe.
The boy's legs were severed at the hip.

sense.def:
To sever a relationship or connection with someone
pomeni končati odnos ali stike z nekom.

seg.quote: She had to sever all ties with her parents.
